title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.30 - Enforcement of rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.30 - Enforcement of rules and regulations

State Regulations
(a) Except in those areas where the duty is
specifically imposed upon some other officer or employee of the Cities of

Albany or Rensselaer, it shall be the duty of any employee of the commission to
whom the authority is delegated, to see to the enforcement of these rules and
regulations, and for that purpose, he shall have the power and authority of a
regular police officer of the Cities of Albany and Rensselaer, including the
power to make arrests for the violation of any of the provisions of these rules
and regulations. (b) It shall also
be the duty of any employee of the commission to report to the proper Federal
or municipal officer the violation of any law, rule or regulation respecting
the operation or control of Albany harbor in every case in which he is not, himself, empowered to act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
